data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Mato Grosso do Sul who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 624,752 believers in Mato Grosso do Sul and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Mato Grosso do Sul.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Mato Grosso do Sul to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil has a population of 2,505,100.

We estimate Mato Grosso do Sul has 624,752 people who might know Jesus, 1,624,334 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 256,014 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

location.name: Mato Grosso do Sul
location.cities_list: Campo Grande, Dourados, Corumbá, Três Lagoas, Pedro Juan Caballero
location.cities_list_w_pop: Campo Grande (729,151), Dourados (162,202), Corumbá (96,520), Três Lagoas (78,712), Pedro Juan Caballero (75,109)
